item.title: How to create a blog using Github Pages and Hugo in 10 minutes
item.description: Step by step guide Let’s say we want to create a new blog called test_site Step 1: Set up 2 Github repos test_site_blog: blog repo. This is the main repo where all the data assets and blogs are saved test_site.github.io: production repo. Tths is we deploy the page from, it has to come with the suffix github.io in order to be published in Github properly Step 2: install Hugo brew install hugo Step 3: create a Hugo side in blog repo hugo new site test_site Step 4: add themes install color themes git submodule add https://github.
